SEARCH
Package org.example.crmedu.application.mapping

Interface UserDTOMapper

public interface UserDTOMapper
A mapper interface for converting between user domain model and its corresponding DTOs. Uses MapStruct for automatic mapping.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    User
    createUserRequestToUser(CreateUserRequest request)
    Converts a CreateUserRequest DTO to a User model.
    User
    idToUser(Long id)
    Converts the unique identifier of the user to User model.
    PageDTO<GetUserResponse>
    pageUserToPageGetResponse(Page<User> page)
    Converts a paginated Page of User entities to a paginated PageDTO of GetUserResponse DTOs.

    Converts a SignInRequest DTO to a User model

  • Method Details

    • pageUserToPageGetResponse

      PageDTO<GetUserResponse> pageUserToPageGetResponse(Page<User> page)
      Converts a paginated Page of User entities to a paginated PageDTO of GetUserResponse DTOs.
      Parameters:
      page - the paginated user entities
      Returns:
      a paginated response DTO containing user data

    • userToGetResponse

      GetUserResponse userToGetResponse(User user)
      Converts a User domain model to a GetUserResponse DTO.
      Parameters:
      user - the user model to convert
      Returns:
      the corresponding GetUserResponse DTO

      Parameters:
      request - the DTO containing user creation details
      Returns:
      the corresponding User model

      Returns:
      the corresponding CreateUserResponse DTO
